name: overseerr
description: Overseerr is a user-friendly request management system built to interact with Radarr, Sonarr, and Plex. It lets users request content for download and automates approvals and metadata fetching.
features: Content requests: Allow users to search and request movies or TV shows for addition to your media library.
Radarr and Sonarr integration: Automatically send approved requests to download managers for processing and monitoring.
Approval workflows: Configure automatic approval or require admin review based on user permissions and quotas.
Plex integration: Sync with Plex libraries to show what content is already available and prevent duplicate requests.
User management: Create accounts with different permission levels to control who can request and approve content.
Notification system: Send alerts via email, Discord, Slack, or other services when requests are submitted or fulfilled.
Metadata display: Show movie posters, descriptions, ratings, and trailers from TMDB for informed request decisions.
Request tracking: Monitor the status of pending, approved, and completed requests with detailed progress information.
